channel.title: Got a problem with new server
channel.description:
Ok i was just making a new server then i come up with this error i check over my work and everything but wondering how to get out of this fix please tell me if you know how to fix
"This system cannot find the path specified.
Error: Unable to startup listener on port 43594-port already in use?" thats what it says so yea please post how to make server work Oo

item.title: Got a problem with new server
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

also close any music players-downloads also

it said that cause i had frostwire running and it uses a port so ya make sure nothing like that is running

Read full topic
item.source: Got a problem with new server

and to fix it, make sure your comp recognizes java.

find god of ikilikiâ€™s thread on how to make a server and he will explain how to do this.

item.title: Got a problem with new server
item.dc:creator: @master_owns master owns
item.description:
@master_owns wrote:

if you already have moparscape running close it close out almost everything running the server has to be the first to run.

Moparscape3.0 does something with the port if you dont use it first

Read full topic
